meaning: Rub hands in anticipation, wait expectantly
description: Same as 「Cuo cuo shou qi dai」. There are various usages such as 「Qi dai de cuo cuo shou」, 「Cuo cuo xiao shou」. 「Cuo cuo shou」 means 「to rub hands」.

examples.chinese: 搓搓手期待明天的好天气
examples.translation: Rubbing my hands in anticipation of good weather tomorrow

examples.chinese: 搓搓期待的小手,等待从天而降的幸福
examples.translation: Rubbing my little hands in anticipation, waiting for happiness to fall from the sky

examples.chinese: 看看自己的结婚对象会是谁（期待地搓搓手）
examples.translation: Let's see who my marriage partner will be (rubs hands expectantly)
